comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "The LeRoy Collins family works just as hard as any other in Florida trimming its Christmas tree and Mrs. Collins and the kids get most of the work done Saturday morning. Little Darby as usual was the biggest 'helper.' The older girls, Mary Call and Jane, helped too. The Governor was out hunting while most of the work was going on and came in just in time to admire their handiwork."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
